params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The resource that the policy is attached to, along with the kind of policy to create. Format: policies/{attachment_point}/denypolicies The attachment point is identified by its URL-encoded full resource name, which means that the forward-slash character, /, must be written as %2F. For example, policies/cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com%2Fprojects%2Fmy-project/denypolicies. For organizations and folders, use the numeric ID in the full resource name. For projects, you can use the alphanumeric or the numeric ID.

params.name: data.policy_id
params.description: The ID to use for this policy, which will become the final component of the policy's resource name. The ID must contain 3 to 63 characters. It can contain lowercase letters and numbers, as well as dashes (-) and periods (.). The first character must be a lowercase letter.
